summary: This is an email chain from August 15, 2019, forwarding a news article about a mistaken inmate release at the Metropolitan Correctional Center (MCC) following Jeffrey Epstein's suicide. The email includes a link to a New York Daily News article on the incident.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: Mentioned as the inmate whose suicide preceded the mistaken release of another inmate at the Metropolitan Correctional Center.

events.title: News article about mistaken inmate release at MCC
events.description: A New York Daily News article reports that an inmate at the Metropolitan Correctional Center was mistakenly released following Jeffrey Epstein's suicide.

events.title: Jeffrey Epstein's suicide
events.description: Jeffrey Epstein died by suicide while in custody at the Metropolitan Correctional Center.

keyFacts: An inmate at the Metropolitan Correctional Center (MCC) was mistakenly released following Jeffrey Epstein's suicide.
The incident was reported in a New York Daily News article on August 15, 2019.
The email serves as internal correspondence forwarding this news article for awareness.
